Html:
Hi Roman,

Jorge

Hi
everything is ok, development continues; sorry, didn't make any code drops for such a long time. Had been busy researching, refactoring and putting new stuff in. And busy on daytime job, and vacation and etc. Didn't have stable rounded-up version to drop. Hopefully will drop something in a couple of weeks.
thanks for caring
Roman
